title: Rara Scenic Tour by Flight & Road - 7 Days
description: Discover Nepal's largest and most beautiful alpine lake in the remote far-western region. This unique tour combines scenic flights and overland journey to explore the pristine Rara National Park.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Kathmandu to Nepalgunj. Rest and prepare for mountain flight next day. Explore the Terai town and experience different culture.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Talcha Airport, Drive to Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Early morning scenic flight to Talcha Airport (weather permitting). Drive to Rara Lake through beautiful countryside. First glimpse of the stunning Rara Lake.

itinerary.title: Explore Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Full day exploration around Rara Lake. Boat ride on the pristine waters, nature walks around the lake, visit to Rara village and local community interaction.

itinerary.title: Rara Lake Exploration
itinerary.description: Continue exploring Rara National Park. Wildlife spotting, hiking to viewpoints, photography, and enjoying the serene environment of Nepal's hidden gem.

itinerary.title: Rara to Talcha, Fly to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning departure from Rara Lake area to Talcha Airport. Flight back to Nepalgunj. Relax and explore the local market.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Nepalgunj to Kathmandu. Free time for last-minute shopping or sightseeing in Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to international airport for departure or extend your stay in Nepal with additional tours.

fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required for altitude and walking.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 21 days before departure
